class.name: PIXI.AbstractFilter

parameters.name: fragmentSrc
parameters.help: The fragment source in an array of strings.

parameters.name: uniforms
parameters.help: An object containing the uniforms for this filter.

class.help: This is the base class for creating a PIXI filter. Currently only webGL supports filters.\nIf you want to make a custom filter this should be your base class.

public.name: syncUniforms
public.help: Syncs the uniforms between the class object and the shaders.

private.name: passes
private.help: An array of passes - some filters contain a few steps this array simply stores the steps in a liniear fashion.\nFor example the blur filter has two passes blurX and blurY.
